lead_paragraph: John P. Holdren, assistant to the president for science and technology, and Kimberly Wright Cassidy, the president of Bryn Mawr College, respond to a column by Charles M. Blow.

headline.main: Getting Women and Minorities Into STEM Fields
headline.print_headline: Getting Women and Minorities Into STEM Fields
